text: God of War is a 2005 hack and slash action-adventure video game released on the PlayStation 2. It was developed by Santa Monica Studio and published by Sony Computer Entertainment. ==Gameplay== Kratos can use the Blades of Chaos to attack enemies and gain abilities from Medusa's head, Zeus' Fury, Army of Hades and Poseidon's Rage. ==Plot== Kratos, the Ghost of Sparta had killed his wife and daughter against his will from Ares. Kratos wanted help from the other Greek mythology gods to defeat Ares using Pandora's Box.
